About this project

Sass

I used Sass preprocessor for managing and creating an easier usage of css, managing css variables and functions, seperating sass code to diffrent files in the development phase for better readability.

Responsive Layout

I used socket.io with node JS server to make a web app that make it possible to send and get messages on real time!

Nodejs with sms and gmail

Integrating Node js with email services and Sms services was an amazing experience. The ability to send emails and text messages gives a lot of directions for developing applications that generate money.
